00029 #ifndef _AP4_STRING_H_
00030 #define _AP4_STRING_H_
00031 
00032 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 |   includes
00034 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035 #include "Ap4Config.h"
00036 #include "Ap4Types.h"
00037 
00038 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 |   AP4_String
00040 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 class AP4_String
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     // constructors
00045     AP4_String();
00046     AP4_String(const char* s);
00047     AP4_String(const char* s, AP4_Size size);
00048     AP4_String(const AP4_String& s);
00049     explicit AP4_String(AP4_Size size);
00050 
00051     // destructor
00052     ~AP4_String();
00053 
00054     // operators
00055     const AP4_String& operator=(const AP4_String& s);
00056     const AP4_String& operator=(const char* s);
00057     char operator[](unsigned int index) const {
00058         return m_Chars[index];
00059     }
00060     const bool operator==(const AP4_String& s) const;
00061     const bool operator!=(const AP4_String& s) const { return !(*this == s); }
00062     const bool operator==(const char* s) const;
00063     const bool operator!=(const char* s) const { return !(*this == s); }
00064 
00065     // methods
00066     AP4_Size    GetLength() const { return m_Length; }
00067     const char* GetChars() const  { return m_Chars;  }
00068     char*       UseChars()        { return m_Chars;  }
00069     void        Assign(const char* chars, AP4_Size size);
00070     int         Find(char c, unsigned int start = 0) const;
00071     
00072 private:
00073     // class members
00074     static char EmptyString;
00075 
00076     // members
00077     char*    m_Chars;
00078     AP4_Size m_Length;
00079 };

00081 #endif // _AP4_STRING_H_
